about_the_game:
The Royal Tourney is about to start and his crush just told him she's really into knights. What's a stableboy to do but enter into a pact with an evil-looking warlock to become the knight of her dreams? What could go wrong? This is quintessential Bertie – always seeking shortcuts to solve life's riddles. Will you help him see the light? Get ready to write your own chapter in this tale.

Join Bertie on his adventure, walk through various locations of the Kingdom of Astris and meet curious characters such as the honorable Don Coyote and the strongman Duncan Douglas. Help Bertie untangle the web of fate he so willingly and unwittingly helped to weave.

Knights Only is a modern take on an adventure game genre where the problems and situations can be solved in many ways, creating a unique playthrough each time you take on the challenge of helping the would-be-hero along.

Features

Choose your own adventure with multiple branching paths
  • you can try to talk your way out of a bind
  • or explore the world to find the solution
  • and when that fails solve logical puzzles or play games of skill to advance the plot
Captivating 3D graphics
  • more than 20 different locations
  • more than 25 different characters
  • playful, handcrafted style
Witty writing and clever puzzle design
  • a three-year journey of high stakes and personal growth
  • unique challenges and puzzles
  • no moon-logic required

Bertie would probably rather be playing cards or do nothing at all, but the fates have chosen him. They had no choice really. He basically forced their hand. Now he needs to make things right. He just needs to handle it.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer
  • Processor: 4-core 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 2GB VRAM and support for Vulkan 1.2 or OpenGL 4.2
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra and above
  • Processor: MacOS High Sierra and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM) or equivalent / GeForce GT 640 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Knights Only: A Brush With Destiny

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800) or equivalent / Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM) or equivalent / GeForce GT 640 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Help Bertie the stableboy find his way out of difficult situations he unwittingly started in this modern take on the adventure game genre. There are many paths to success, making each playthrough unique. Help Bertie on his journey to becoming the hero of the kingdom, whether he wants to or not.
